summary: Adds 4 craftable steel shields. All new mesh and textures.
descriptionHtml:
Thought I would make a steel knights shield and this is it. it is craftable in the steel menu. Not much to say about it aside from its a shield and made out of steel.

It is rather plain because I am not a texture artist, but it is free to retexture it and change smithing requirements if anyone wants to use it. Just give me credit where it is due. This is a modder resource and playable.

Forgive the screenshots, shadows and lighting is messed up in my game.

*updates*
v 1.5
* Fixed Shield A texture disappearing issue.

v 1.42
* Made shield A and B brighter, I wasn't happy with them being as dark as they were.
* All four shields can now be picked up in Riverwood at Alvor and Sigrid's House or Hod and Gerdur's House. Pick them up in the beginning of the game when the house owners allow you to take things from there homes depending on who you escaped Helgan with.

v 1.4
Added a new shield.
last preCK update bacause i couldn't be arsed to redo it all since it was already done yesterday.

v 1.3
Added another new shield, this one with spikes.

v 1.2
Added a new shield.
fixed lighting issue on the original.

Other mods by me

[spoiler]
